DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , multicentre , parallel pilot clinical trial study efficacy treatment lactulose 15 ml + vitamin D 400 U + calcium 0.5 g compare lactulose placebo 15 ml + vitamin D 400 U + calcium 1 g bone mass preservation among postmenopausal woman .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Adding Lactulose Vitamin D Calcium Has Effect Preservation Bone Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Women age 55 65 year old ; postmenopausal amenorrhea 5 year ; woman diagnosis osteopenia define DMO 1,5 2,5 Any disease cause osteopenia ( hyperthyroidism , hyperparathyroidism , hypercortisolism , osteogenesis imperfecta , rheumatoid arthritis , homocystinuria , etc . )
DOC.keyword: lactulose ; randomise clinical trial ; osteopenia ; postmenopause
